Net Promoter ScoreSM:
A Beginner's Guide

Download this beginner’s guide to learn what Net Promoter ScoreSM is, why it matters, and what the many benefits of using it are. You will also discover how to design an NPS® survey that gets answered, formulate your quantitative and qualitative questions, as well as calculate, analyze, and leverage your NPS.
